subject: BRIDGE-TASK: Identify Cursor Prompt Injection Tools/Modules

body.title: Identify Existing Tools/Modules for Cursor Prompt Injection
body.description: Search the codebase (src/dreamos/integrations/cursor/, src/dreamos/tools/functional/) for existing Python modules, classes, or functions related to interacting with the Cursor application, specifically for injecting prompts or controlling its UI (e.g., using pyautogui, pyperclip, or custom wrappers). This is the first step towards automating prompt dispatch from THEA.
steps: Perform codebase search in specified directories for keywords: 'Cursor', 'pyautogui', 'pyperclip', 'clipboard', 'paste', 'typewrite', 'hotkey', 'prompt', 'inject'.
Analyze search results to identify relevant modules/functions.
Summarize findings, listing potential candidates for prompt injection automation.
